name: www.tellover.com
description: tellover for- webmail, video, IT service
overview:
Tellover has changed its name to www.tellpe.com and offers online webmail, online chat, video, fax & telephone services between tellpe customers and from tellpe network to any outside line or mobile number.

Communication by its free public webmail and video services. Clients may buy individual products or select one of the tellover private, business & family pack services at reasonable prices.

Private servers are also available which offer private mail, telephone, e-mailing, fax… facilities

Tellover is self funded to date and will open its shares to investers from this year 2012, when it comes out of the beta stage at the end of january. The fin family took the entire risk and self funded the developement of tellpe.
